1039740.name: Your Home - Art Book
1039740.description:
This DLC contains a digital 14 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.
